comment.body:
Almost by design as DNS filter doesn't support `$third-party`. Can possibly be adjusted to
```
||static.affiliate.rakuten.co.jp^$third-party
xml.affiliate.rakuten.co.jp^$third-party
```
if doing so fixes the issue and covers all ads.
